title: At Last, This Is What You’ve Been Searching For.
posting_body: Exchange Studios is a Loft complex located in Jingletown, Oakland California.
Exchange Studios features True Lofts; that is an industrial space converted to living space with as much exposed architecture as possible and an Open Floor Plan.
Our units feature exposed brick, beams, and some have upgraded kitchen and baths.
Exchange Studios is just 2 miles from Crown Beach and Southshore in Alameda as well as Park Street Market Place.
If you head down the Embarcadero you can enjoy biking straight down to Jack London Square, water sports and fine dining.
Exchange Studios is a unique complex and vacancies are usually rare.
Due to Covid, we have several openings and have reduced rents.
Call us today and take advantage of an amazing and unique opportunity.
Application fee: $45.00 Per Applicant 18 yrs. or older
On-site-first floor Full-size Washer & Dryer- Coin and App operated
Parking type: $75.00 off-street- gated- newly paved
Exterior: community seating area, plants, urban environment
*photos are representative of a similar but different unit*
